settings.defaultOpenLastRead: Open discussion at last read post default
settings.suggestFirstTime: Show a prompt to the user to change the setting the first time they open a discussion

firstTimePrompt.fromAlways: Discussions links lead to your last read post
firstTimePrompt.fromNever: Discussions links open the first post

openLastOptions.always: Always open at the last post I read instead
openLastOptions.never: Always open at the first post instead

openLastOptions.always: Always open discussions at the last read post
openLastOptions.unread: Only open discussions at the last read post if there are new replies
openLastOptions.never: Always open discussions at the first post
